text:
Very good advice from a doctor - and, try to stay prone - if you have a recliner chair, maybe try sleeping in that, propped up with pillows, if ur having difficulty breathing
#StaySafe #StayHealthy! 
#SelfAdvocate, too - ask for the #chloroquine & #Zpak
